# Title 2

# A leaflet map

From `leaflet` docs.

```{r}
# !formatR
library(leaflet)
m <- leaflet() %>% addTiles()
m  # a map with the default OSM tile layer


# set bounds
m %>% fitBounds(0, 40, 10, 50)

# move the center to Snedecor Hall
m <- m %>% setView(-93.65, 42.0285, zoom = 17)
m
```
